data.title: Apartments near Oakland University in Auburn Hills, MI
data.meta_description: Looking for an apartment in a great neighborhood? Visit our site to learn more about Five Points located in Auburn Hills near Rochester Hills.
data.text:
Apartments with a Central Location

At Five Points, our convenient location in Oakland County offers many benefits. Within just a few minutes-drive, you are in downtown Rochester where fine dining, shopping and attractions are all staples of this historic yet hip city.Â

Certainly, the city of Auburn Hills is perfect for both work and play. With several well-known employers in the area, it is quickly growing into a professional hub of diverse talent and home to national and international corporate headquarters. Local employers include Fiat Chrysler, Oakland University, Crittenton Hospital, Delphi Automotive, Kelly Services, Faurecia North America, Magna International of America, Flagstar Bancorp Inc.Â

After a long day of work or for a Saturday afternoon, you can relax and immerse yourself in the culture the area has to offer. Take a leisurely stroll through Meadow Brook Hall, enjoy a professional stage show at Meadow Brook Theatre or stroll through the Walter P. Chrysler Museum.Â

At Five Points Apartments, you can easily immerse yourself into all that the area has to offer.

Simple Convenience

Located in Auburn Hills, Five Points is conveniently located just east of I-75 at University and Five Points Drive, near Rochester Hills. With numerous popular dining options and an abundance of shopping options, it is a foodie and shopperâs dream come true.Â

If you are looking for a more laidback activity to connect with nature, visit River Woods Park to enjoy the nicely manicured leafy park featuring a network of maintained trails, a playground and picnic shelter or plan a trip to Paint Creek Trail that traverses through Rochester, Rochester Hills, Oakland Township, Orion Township and the Village of Lake Orion.

Whatever the activity is, you are certain to find it within the convenient location of Five Points Apartments. From the beautiful community to the luxurious apartment features, you will have everything you need to feel right at home.
